meanings.definition: A tract of open uncultivated upland; a moor.
meanings.sent1: The sheep grazed peacefully on the muir.
meanings.sent2: The hikers enjoyed the scenic views of the muir.
meanings.sent3: The muir seemed to whisper secrets to the passing clouds.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the muir turned into a golden sea of tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The muir stretched out like a vast green blanket under the sky.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Muir greeted us warmly at the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: The Muir family has a long history in the village.
meanings.sent3: When someone mentioned the Muir surname, everyone turned to look.
meanings.sent4: The name Muir echoed through the halls of the old castle.
meanings.sent5: The Muir surname was synonymous with honor and loyalty.
